title: xtorrent.zip
description:
For Xtorrent 1.1 (build 53)

Instructions:

1) Download the disk image from the official site.
   (http://www.xtorrentp2p.com/)

2) Install the software wherever you want.

3) Run the software. Quit it.

4) Drag the file "org.xlife.Xtorrent.plist" into /Users/yourusername/Library/Preferences and change the existing file.

Now you can use Xtorrent with any restriction. Enjoy!



PS. I have tried it several times and it always work. I hope the same for you.
